EVM Grand Piano VST

http://www.realmusicmaker.com/evm-grand-piano/

EVM Grand Piano is a high quality stereo acoustic grand piano with presence and velocity. Some other features: Tune, Decay, Sustain…
Developer: EVM Synths
Operation System: Windows

4F Epiano VST

http://www.realmusicmaker.com/4f-epiano1/

This VST has a very nice sound which is pretty unique.
The technology which is used to create this VST is hybrid, this means the VST is both a sampler and a synthesizer.
Even the size is small, the quality is very high. This low size VST will never overload your CPU like other giant VST.

Clavi

http://www.realmusicmaker.com/clavi/

Clavi is a piano instrument with one sound only. It has the characteristics of a modern, synthesized sound. There are no controls or user adjustments.

How to make a good Rap beat

http://www.zimbio.com/Beat+Maker/articles/hW0xAVUoG6h/How+to+make+a+good+Rap+beat

Today, I am going to tell you some tips to make a good rap beat. So, let me go straight to our topic: what are the most important aspects of a nice beat? There are a lot. But the most important ones are: the depth and the characteristic. So, what are the depth and the characteristic of a beat? By saying the depth, I mean the feeling you get when you listen to that beat. Is not emotion the most important thing in composing music? Yes, it is right? So, your emotion when you listen to a beat ...

Roland Jupiter 80 Sound Demo & Review & Technical In

http://www.realmusicmaker.com/roland-jupiter-80-sound-demo-review-technical-info/

One of the most revered prefixes in the history of synthesis returns. Welcome the arrival of the JUPITER-80— a live-performance powerhouse that pays homage to its legendary namesake with road-proven hardware and massive sound, yet blasts into the future with advanced SuperNATURAL technology. The JUPITER-80?s expressive, organic approach to synthesis makes a new world of sound design possible with multilayered SuperNATURAL textures under the control of a full-color touchscreen and creative hands-on controllers. Experience the metamorphosis of a legend with the all-new JUPITER-80!....
